guide.introduction:
This project was created by Ichimasa YAGI who is a professor of the Iwate University Department of Education. He is also the CEO of EWI(Experimental Workshop Iwate). His company develops scientific teaching equipment that will encourage the growth of science in schools and universities throughout the world.
